function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation and indoor air quality (IAQ)","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne contagious disease transmission, potential health issues for residents","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems, air filtration, and IAQ monitoring","Technologies":"HVAC systems with HEPA filters, air purifiers, indoor air quality monitors","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Building management, construction companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate space for social distancing and home quarantine","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within the home environment","Mitigation":"Proper space planning, larger living areas, designated quarantine spaces","Technologies":"Home automation for space management, smart layout designs, flexible furniture","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, building management"},{"Description":"Lack of domestic green spaces and natural views","Impact":"Reduced access to nature and outdoor areas, impacting mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Incorporating indoor plants, creating access to outdoor views, green rooftop spaces","Technologies":"Indoor gardening systems, smart windows for natural light, rooftop garden structures","People":"Residents, building occupants","Owner":"Developers, building management"}]}
